CustomField.description: This setting determines how questions are classified as odd or even for the purpose of setting background colors. Odd-Even Over Entire Survey: Questions will be classified as odd or even based on their sequential order throughout the entire survey. Odd-Even Each Section Separately: Questions will be classified as odd or even based on their sequential order within each section separately.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This setting determines how questions are classified as odd or even for the purpose of setting background colors. Odd-Even Over Entire Survey: Questions will be classified as odd or even based on their sequential order throughout the entire survey. Odd-Even Each Section Separately: Questions will be classified as odd or even based on their sequential order within each section separately.
CustomField.label: Odd-Even Question Classification
